item.title: From high-school comedies to dark police dystopias – an anime for all seasons
item.author: Pavan Inguva,Mingrou Xie,
item.description: Japanese manga and anime has something for everyone: enchanting soundtracks, remarkable aesthetics and animation, nuanced and thought-provoking storylines, and more. As a media form, it has always been bold and refreshing, pushing the boundary on plots, character development, and artistic styles to …
